participant_1.background:
I spend my days reading about politics and economics, and trying to understand how the world works.
my mother is a teacher in the city.
i have a nice smile.
i want to be an astronaut when i grow up.
I am a young woman who enjoys being independent and having my own secrets.

participant_2.background:
I do my best to keep up with my family, although it's hard to stay connected with everyone when you're working all the time.
I don't care much about the weather, as long as my dog is happy.
I played a concert last night and was nervous about how my outfit would look on stage, but I ended up getting a lot of compliments!
I had to learn how to cook without shrimp because of my shellfish allergy.
i will be on bed rest for the next 5 months.

content.text: Hi, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play concerts and sing. I played a concert last night and was nervous about how my outfit would look on stage, but I ended up getting a lot of compliments!
That's really cool! I love singing too. I'm actually trying to become an astronaut when I grow up.
Really? That's so neat! What's your favorite thing about space?
I love learning about how the universe works. I also like the idea of being able to explore new planets and learn about new life forms.
That's so cool! I'm sure you'll make a great astronaut.
What do you think your favorite part of being an astronaut would be?
I think it would be amazing to be able to see the Earth from space. It would be so beautiful and humbling.
I agree! That would be incredible.
I hope I can make it happen.
I'm sure you will! You sound very determined.
